com.codingforcookies.mayaui.src.ui.theme

Class UITheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codingforcookies.mayaui.src.ui.theme.UITheme

  • public class UITheme
extends java.lang.Object
    Themes are reminiscent of CSS in how they are loaded. This class holds all name, creator, description, and class information.
    Author:
    Stumblinbear
